game.name: PAYDAY 2: Gage Sniper Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Gage Sniper Pack DLC is the seventh DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds powerful sniper rifles to the player's weapon arsenal. The bullets from a sniper rifle have armor penetration which means they can go through objects like walls. One bullet can even pierce several enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Gage Sniper Pack DLC is the seventh DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds powerful sniper rifles to the player's weapon arsenal. The bullets from a sniper rifle have armor penetration which means they can go through objects like walls. One bullet can even pierce several enemies.
